request.description:
Creates menu by restaurant if there is not a menu with mention restaurant and day.

RequestBody:

dayNumber : Integer {0 -> Monday, 1 -> Tuesday, 2 - > Wednesday, 3 -> Thursday, 4 -> Friday, 5 -> Saturday, 6 -> Sunday } : shows the day of menu which will be created.

restaurantId : String,

currencyType : Integer {0 -> USD, 1 -> EUR, 2 -> JPY, 3 -> GBP, 4 -> TRY}. Specifies the menu currency.

menuItems : List : The item list that is provided by restaurant to be included in the menu.

MenuItem : {name : String , description : String,

price: double

ResponseBody:

restaurantName : String,

currencyType : Integer

day: Integer,

menuItems : List : The item list that is provided by restaurant to be included in the menu.

MenuItem : {name : String , description : String,

price: double}

StartFragment

Creates menu by restaurant if there is a menu with the given restaurantId and day.

RequestBody:

dayNumber : Integer {0 -> Monday, 1 -> Tuesday, 2 - > Wednesday, 3 -> Thursday, 4 -> Friday, 5 -> Saturday, 6 -> Sunday } : shows the day of menu which will be created.

currencyType : Integer {0 -> USD, 1 -> EUR, 2 -> JPY, 3 -> GBP, 4 -> TRY}. Specifies the menu currency.

menuItems : List : The item list that is provided by restaurant to be included in the menu.

MenuItem : {name : String , description : String,

price: double

ResponseBody:

currencyType : Integer

day: Integer,

menuItems : List : The item list that is provided by restaurant to be included in the menu.

price: double}

EndFragment

Deletes the menu if there is a menu with given restaurantId and day.

RequestBody:

restaurantId : String,

StartFragment

 day: Integer {0 -> Monday, 1 -> Tuesday, 2 - > Wednesday, 3 -> Thursday, 4 -> Friday, 5 -> Saturday, 6 -> Sunday }

Response:

boolean for specifying the validation of the deletion operation.

EndFragment

Returns the menus of the given day.
